topic.title: WebHelp Classic XSLT-Import and XSLT-Parameter Extension Points

body.p: The WebHelp XSLT-Import extension points allows you to extend the XSLT stylesheets associated with some of the WebHelp transformation steps. The DITA-OT plug-in installer adds an XSLT import statement in the default WebHelp XSLT so that the XSLT stylesheet referenced by the extension point becomes part of the normal build.
body.note: The customizations you make by using this extension point will affect all WebHelp transformations. If you want to have a customization that is only available for a certain transformation, use the Overriding a WebHelp XSLT Stylesheet from an Ant Build File method.

section.title: XSLT-Import Extension Points
section.p: The following extension points are available:

dlentry.dd: Extension point to override the XSLT stylesheet (dita2webhelpImpl.xsl) that produces an HTML file for each DITA topic. The path to this stylesheet is: \plugins\com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic\xsl\dita\desktop\dita2webhelpImpl.xsl

Extension point to override the XSLT stylesheet (createMainFilesImpl.xsl) that produces the WebHelp main HTML page (index.html). The path to this stylesheet is: \plugins\com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic\xsl\dita\desktop\createMainFilesImpl.xsl

Extension point to override the XSLT stylesheet (tocDita.xsl) that produces the toc.xml file. This file contains information extracted from the DITA map and it is mainly used to construct the WebHelp Table of Contents and navigational links. The path to this stylesheet is: \plugins\com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic\xsl\dita\tocDita.xsl.

section.title: XSLT-Parameter Extension Points
section.p: If your customization stylesheet declares one or more XSLT parameters and you want to control their values from the transformation scenario, you can use one of the following XSLT parameter extension points:

dlentry.dd: Use this extension point to pass parameters to the stylesheet specified using the com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic.xsl.dita2webhelp extension point.
Use this extension point to pass parameters to the stylesheet specified using the com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic.xsl.createMainFiles extension point.
Use this extension point to pass parameters to the stylesheet specified using the com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic.xsl.createTocXML extension point.
